heisigStory: Those special gold-colored tokens minted each year for the Mardi Gras and thrown into the crowds from people on the floats give us the kanji for coins.
koohiiStory1: Political hopefuls in Rome threw gold COINS from floats when they were campaigning for office.
koohiiStory2: Interesting fact: The Japanese one yen coin is the only coin in the world that can float on water. http://www.hanamiweb.com/floatingyen.jpg.
myStory: đồng xu. tiền nhét vào rãnh
